title: The FSI permitted as per Table No
clause_text: The FSI permitted as per Table No. 12 will be allowed to be exceeded for redevelopment of existing authorized building to the extent of existing authorized development rights/BUA and shall be also entitled for the additional FSI as per relevant regulations.
